name: Monochrome Labyrinth - Tale Of The Spectral Sword
name_original: Monochrome Labyrinth - Tale Of The Spectral Sword
description:
My Submission For PossiblyAxolotl's IMPOSSIJAM 2022

Welcome to the monochrome dungeons, where you can find yourself screwed in just about every meaning of the word, i dont know how you got here, but theres plenty to be afraid of, slimes and the illuminated being two big ones, be prepared to fight, for waiting out the storm is no longer an option.....

Controls -

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Back

D - Right

Space- Jump 

Left Mouse - Swing Sword

E - Inspect Weapon

Left Shift - Sprint

Notes-

Enemies don't have heath bars but are all killable, some take more hits (as you would come to expect)

THINK OUT OF THE (MAZE) BOX - there are secrets, and each secrets explains why there is colour included in this game, despite mostly being black and white

There are powerups in it - be ready to become more powerful as you go!

There is only one level - Game jam restrictions means more levels couldn't be made in time, considering I had one day less! however you can play it as many times as you want, and take a different approach
